btkNLMDenoising4DImage.cxx

00034 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00035 
00036 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00037 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00038 
00039 #include "itkImage.h"
00040 #include "itkExtractImageFilter.h"
00041 #include "itkJoinSeriesImageFilter.h"
00042 
00043 #include "../Code/Denoising/btkNLMTool.h"
00044 
00045 #include <vector>
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00048 {
00049 
00050   try {
00051 
00052     TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Command description message", ' ', "1.0", true);
00053 
00054     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputImageArg("i","image_file","input image file (short)",true,"","string");
00055     cmd.add( inputImageArg );
00056     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputImageArg("o","output_file","output image file (short)",true,"","string");
00057     cmd.add( outputImageArg );
00058     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputMaskArg("m","mask_file","filename of the mask image",false,"","string");
00059     cmd.add( inputMaskArg );
00060     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > paddingArg("p","pad","padding value (used if no mask image is provided, default is -1)",false,-1,"float");
00061     cmd.add( paddingArg );
00062     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwnArg("","hwn","patch half size (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00063     cmd.add( hwnArg );
00064     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwvsArg("","hwvs","half size of the volume search area, i.e. the spatial bandwidth (default is 5)",false,5,"int");
00065     cmd.add( hwvsArg );
00066     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > betaArg("b","beta","beta: smoothing parameter (high beta produces smoother result, default is 1)",false,1,"float");
00067     cmd.add( betaArg );
00068     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > blockArg("","block","0: pointwise, 1: blockwise, 2: fast blockwise (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00069     cmd.add( blockArg );
00070     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > centerArg("c","center","weight of the central patch (possible value: 0, 1, -1 (max)) (default is -1)",false,-1,"int");
00071     cmd.add( centerArg );
00072     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > optimizedArg("","opt","optimized mode (use mean and standard deviation of patches) (0: no, 1: yes) (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00073     cmd.add( optimizedArg );
00074     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerMeanThresholdArg("","lmt","lower mean threshold (0.95 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.95,"float");
00075     cmd.add( lowerMeanThresholdArg );
00076     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerVarianceThresholdArg("","lvt","lower variance threshold (0.5 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.5,"float");
00077     cmd.add( lowerVarianceThresholdArg );
00078 
00079     // Parse the args.
00080     cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00081 
00082 
00083     // Get the value parsed by each arg.
00084     std::string input_file       = inputImageArg.getValue();
00085     std::string output_file      = outputImageArg.getValue();
00086 
00087     std::string mask_file        = inputMaskArg.getValue();
00088     float padding                = paddingArg.getValue();
00089     int hwn                      = hwnArg.getValue();
00090     int hwvs                     = hwvsArg.getValue();
00091     float beta                   = betaArg.getValue();
00092     int block                    = blockArg.getValue();
00093     int center                   = centerArg.getValue();
00094     int optimized                = optimizedArg.getValue();
00095     float lowerMeanThreshold     = lowerMeanThresholdArg.getValue();
00096     float lowerVarianceThreshold = lowerVarianceThresholdArg.getValue();
00097 
00098 
00099     //ITK declaration
00100     typedef short PixelType;
00101     const   unsigned int        Dimension = 4;
00102     typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >    Image4DType; //same type for input and output
00103     typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension-1 >  Image3DType; //temp images (we use here a 3D version of the NLM filter)
00104     typedef Image4DType::Pointer Image4DPointer;
00105     typedef Image3DType::Pointer Image3DPointer;
00106 
00107     typedef itk::ImageFileReader< Image4DType >  Reader4DType;
00108     typedef itk::ImageFileReader< Image3DType >  Reader3DType;
00109     typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< Image4DType >  Writer4DType;
00110 
00111     typedef itk::ExtractImageFilter< Image4DType, Image3DType > ExtractImageFilterType;
00112     ExtractImageFilterType::Pointer extractor  = ExtractImageFilterType::New();
00113 
00114     typedef itk::JoinSeriesImageFilter< Image3DType, Image4DType > JoinSeriesFilterType;
00115     JoinSeriesFilterType::Pointer concatenator  = JoinSeriesFilterType::New();
00116 
00117 
00118     //Read the image
00119     Reader4DType::Pointer reader = Reader4DType::New();
00120     reader->SetFileName( input_file );
00121     reader->Update();
00122     Image4DPointer inputImage = reader->GetOutput();
00123 
00124     extractor->SetInput( inputImage );
00125 
00126     Image4DType::RegionType input4DRegion = inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00127     Image4DType::SizeType input4DSize = input4DRegion.GetSize();
00128 
00129     Image4DType::SizeType desired3DSize;
00130     desired3DSize[0] = input4DSize[0];
00131     desired3DSize[1] = input4DSize[1];
00132     desired3DSize[2] = input4DSize[2];
00133     desired3DSize[3] = 0;
00134 
00135     concatenator->SetOrigin( inputImage->GetOrigin()[3] );
00136     concatenator->SetSpacing( inputImage->GetSpacing()[3] );
00137 
00138     Image4DType::IndexType start = input4DRegion.GetIndex();
00139     uint numberOf3Dimages = input4DSize[3];
00140 
00141     for (uint i = 0; i < numberOf3Dimages; i++){
00142       std::cout<<"Filtering the 3D image : "<<i+1<<"\n";
00143 
00144       start[3] = i;
00145 
00146       Image4DType::RegionType desiredRegion;
00147       desiredRegion.SetSize(  desired3DSize  );
00148       desiredRegion.SetIndex( start );
00149       std::cout<<"3D region : "<<desired3DSize[0]<<" "<<desired3DSize[1]<<" "<<desired3DSize[2]<<" "<<desired3DSize[3]<<"\n";
00150 
00151       extractor->SetExtractionRegion( desiredRegion );
00152       extractor->SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00153       extractor->Update();
00154       Image3DPointer input3DImage = extractor->GetOutput();
00155 
00156       Image3DType::RegionType input3DRegion = input3DImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00157       Image3DType::SizeType input3DSize = input3DRegion.GetSize();
00158       std::cout<<"3D image size : "<<input3DSize[0]<<" "<<input3DSize[1]<<" "<<input3DSize[2]<<"\n";
00159 
00160       Image3DPointer output3DImage = Image3DType::New();
00161       Image3DPointer maskImage = Image3DType::New();
00162 
00163       btkNLMTool<PixelType> myTool;
00164 
00165       myTool.SetInput(input3DImage);
00166 
00167       if (mask_file!=""){               //reading the mask image
00168   Reader3DType::Pointer maskReader = Reader3DType::New();
00169   maskReader->SetFileName( mask_file );
00170   maskReader->Update();
00171   maskImage = maskReader->GetOutput();
00172   myTool.SetMaskImage(maskImage);
00173       }
00174       else                                 //creating a mask image using the padding value
00175   myTool.SetPaddingValue(padding);
00176 
00177       myTool.SetPatchSize(hwn);
00178       myTool.SetSpatialBandwidth(hwvs);
00179       myTool.SetSmoothing(beta);
00180       myTool.SetCentralPointStrategy(center);
00181       myTool.SetBlockwiseStrategy(block);
00182       myTool.SetOptimizationStrategy(optimized);
00183       myTool.SetLowerThresholds(lowerMeanThreshold, lowerVarianceThreshold);
00184 
00185       myTool.ComputeOutput();
00186       myTool.GetOutput(output3DImage);
00187 
00188       concatenator->PushBackInput(output3DImage);
00189     }
00190 
00191 
00192     //Write the result
00193 
00194     Writer4DType::Pointer writer = Writer4DType::New();
00195     writer->SetFileName( output_file );
00196     writer->SetInput( concatenator->GetOutput() );
00197     writer->Update();
00198 
00199     return 1;
00200 
00201   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00202   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00203 
00204 
00205 }
Generated on Wed Sep 7 2011 15:23:17 for btk by  1.7.1
